resources.string:
This random game is made by Neil Ding and Sean Yang, the authors are students of
CMPT276-Introduction to Software Engineering.

The goal of this game is to find all the hidden mines inside the slots.
 Clicking one slot will reveal: 
	1. a mine! if the slot contains a mine; 
	2. a number! if the slot is not a mine. The number indicates the remaining mines in the same row and column of the slot. 
If a mine is revealed, clicking the mine again will reveal the number of remaining mines in the same row and column as well. 
What a nice useless boring application that really shapes and trains our skills!

The following links are the resources used in this game: \n\t Land mine image
\n\t Main menu image
An image of rust character playing flute
